page.title: 16CHILDREN'S GAMES,MADDERTY
page.content: {TV'S One person stands at the wall and shouts out a TV programme. We run if we think we know it. If we are wrong we go back down to think again. But if we are correct, we change places with the leader. {POLO One person stands at the wall and shouts out names of trees or something and we stand in a circle and pick a favorite tree.Whoever chose the name of the tree he picks, runs and trys to beat the leader and then say " Polo." {FAIRY STEPS AND GIANT STEPS Children stand in a line. The leader,hiding his eyes or blindfold, calls someone by name and tells them to take so many giant, or long steps, or else so many fairy ,or short,steps. First person to reach the wall is the winner.
